amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered as en bloc No.6: 90, 91, 96, 99, 101, 102, 103, 104, 105, 106, 112, 113, 114, 115, 116, 117, and 118 printed in House Report 114-112.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 90, 91, 96, 99, 101, 102, 103, 104, 105, 106, 112, 113, 114, 115, 116, 117, and 118 contained in House Report 114-112. See page D550 of the Congressional Record of May 15, 2015 for description of en bloc amendments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A021) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A021) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
